key.name: show-toolbar
key.description: Toolbar is the top bar that contains navigation and zoom controls. Two boolean options, true makes toolbar visible by default while false makes toolbar not visible by default.

key.name: show-statusbar
key.description: Statusbar is the bottom bar that contains help and status messages. Two boolean options, true makes statusbar visible by default while false makes statusbar not visible by default.

key.name: zoom-mode
key.description: There are two zoom modes available, 'best-fit' makes the current comic fill the window, 'fit-width' makes the current comic fill the window width.
